23  |  SafetyCultivating Safety Where 
We Live and Work 
When a workplace is safe, employees feel more comfortable and confident and do 
their best work. ArcBest has policies in place, supported by our Code of Conduct, 
that help create a safe environment for all. Because we care about our customers, 
business partners and communities, the impact of these policies extends to them 
as well. To help ensure our safety and security policies and practices remain 
current, each year, teams across the organization collaborate to set safety goals, 
monitor performance, identify new potential hazards and implement new initiatives. 
2021 was no exception.
